<h1 align="center">Lara Zeus Rhea</h1>

Lara-zeus Rhea is a tool to migrate from wordpress to zeus sky

> small tasks can be time-consuming, let us build these for you,

## features
- ðŸ”¥ truncate before importing
- ðŸ”¥ overwrite when importing
- ðŸ”¥ will import categories and tags
- ðŸ”¥ import posts and pages

## Installation

You can install the package via composer:
note: this package will install [jgrossi/corcel](https://github.com/corcel/corcel)

```bash
composer require lara-zeus/rhea
```

## Database Setup
use the instructions from the package corcel [here](https://github.com/corcel/corcel#-database-setup)

## Usage

visit the url `/admin/importer` to start importing your posts.
